00002  *  maven Programming Language

00006 #include "maven.h"
00007 #include "struct_StringList.h"
00008 #include "struct_MavenCompiler.h"
00009 #include "strings.h"
00010 #include "objects.h"
00011 #include "enums.h"
00012 #include "constants.h"
00013 #include "namespaces.h"

00015 MavenVariable dissectVariable(MavenCompiler* c, string line) {
00016         MavenVariable v;
00017         StringList parts = smartTokens(line);
00018         v.atLine = c->lineNumber;
00019         
00020         // variable length arguments
00021         if(trim(line) == "...") {
00022                 v.type = "maven.Object[]";
00023                 v.name = "varargs";
00024                 return v;
00025         }
00026         
00027         // read keywords in order
00028         if(trim(line) == "") return v;
00029         int i = 0;
00030         
00031         if(parts[i] == "public") {
00032                 v.isPublic = true;
00033                 ++i;
00034         } else if(parts[i] == "private") {
00035                 v.isPublic = false;
00036                 ++i;
00037         }
00038         
00039         if(parts[i] == "constant") {
00040                 v.mutability = MU_CONSTANT;
00041                 ++i;
00042         }
00043         if(parts[i] == "static") {
00044                 v.isStatic = true;
00045                 ++i;
00046         }
00047         
00048         v.type = parts[i++];
00049         
00050         int nID = findNamespaceID(c, c->currentNamespace);
00051         int enumID = findEnumID(c, nID, v.type);
00052         if(!isDataType(v.type) && enumID < 0)
00053                 v.type = findMavenObjectPath(c, v.type);
00054         if(enumID >= 0)
00055                 v.type = c->currentNamespace + "." + c->namespaces->at(nID).enums[enumID].name;
00056         
00057         v.name = parts[i++];
00058         return v;
00059 }
